extendedInfo.description: I  have  come across lot of paint applications and try to do design  a new  âPaint Processingâ  ,which is easy to use  but still provide  much more features  beyond painting. I  try to  add photoshop  flavors in painting .Scope Of Apllication:1.	Provide enhanced features for image manipulation. You can choose any picture from your phone  gallery  and can provide differ effect like Invert, Gray Scale ,Engrave, Gaussian Blur ,Emboss, Snow Effect ,Reflection and many more.2.	Rotation of image in different angles .3.	User is free to choose different  types of brushes like spray ,shadow, normal and deep.4.	Different size of brushes are available ,right from pencil thick  to fat brush.5.	Providing  color box to pick different  magnificent color.6.	Redo  ,Undo, Erase, Blank canvas   features are available to make the paint  stable.7.	Possible to save file  locally and sharing  in different social network like  Facebook ,WhatsApp along  with  Gmail ,Bluetooth ,Messaging ,Picasa.Future Enhancement:      1.Magic drawing.     2.Image Cropping .	     3.Any user requested feature .Special thanks to my wife for lots of input, to make the initial version  .New Features Added:1.Cropping.2.Increment/Decrements  of  effects On Image.3.Capturing  Image from camera.4.Adding image/word sticker with zoom in /zoom out facility.5.Kid Zone

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Nice work Rivu... It\'s a effective painting tool.  :-)
reviews.author: saif ahmed

reviews.title: Good app:-)
reviews.comment: Try to add some new flavour in paint....Please give your suggestions to make it more perfact.. ...
reviews.author: raj paul
